cleanlinessDescriptor: reasonably tidy. There are stacks of paper here and there, loosely organized in a semi-thought out fashion.
disastrously messy. There are papers strewn about, covering the floor. Potions & vials are splayed about in rambunctious fashion. It looks as though a small tornado has had it's way with the room.

rather messy. There are scattered papers & vials strewn about the room. You can see a semi-thought out organization to the sections of the room, with one half being a a large wooden counter, with poorly made displays filled with all manner of things that may or may not be for sale.
pristinely tidy. The ground is emaculate, clearly having been swept recently. The counter is almost empty, save for 3 perfectly thought out display cases showcasing the most potent potions available.
entranceDescription: You push an oddly heavy brass door open and enter
The door creaks and falls back with a light thud as you enter
You push through an oddly light door and walk in to
You walk through the doorway and enter
A light creak sounds from the rusty door as you enter
A heavy wooden door swings open as you enter
